message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe has the potential to significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to discussing the details with you.

I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products. I'm interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can we meet in the middle at $900000?

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. In light of this, I would like to propose a revised price of $925000 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise while still reflecting the value and quality of the item. I hope this suggestion will be acceptable to you, and I look forward to your consideration.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'd like to propose a price of $875000. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value and the market conditions. Can we meet at this price?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to stay within your budget. After careful consideration, I am willing to negotiate further. I would like to propose a price of $900000 for the product. I believe this reflects a reasonable compromise between our positions. I hope this proposal will be agreeable to you, and I look forward to your response.
